fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Some of the proposed policies involved in this project include: dynamic improvements to IPR and knowledge transfers that facilitate joint partnerships between knowledge intensive SMEs and larger industrial incumbents.
relevant_communication: We are currently planning to participate in the H2020 Innosup-07-2019 Topic: European Open Innovation network in advanced technologies.
goals__remit: Our organization’s goal is to bridge the gap between innovation and European SMEs by providing access-to-advanced technologies.
